bill_title: direct the Department of Labor and Regulation to compile statistics related to poverty and workforce development on tribal lands.

bill_versions.bill_text: An Act to direct the Department of Labor and Regulation to compile statistics related to poverty and workforce development on tribal lands. Be it enacted by the Legislature of the State of South Dakota: Section 1. That a NEW SECTION be added: 1-37-22. Statistics on workforce development on tribal lands. The Department of Labor and Regulation shall annually compile statistics related to poverty and workforce development for Native Americans on tribal lands, including employment, unemployment, underemployment, median family income, personal income, disposable income, and per capita income. The Department of Labor and Regulation shall report these statistics to the Department of Tribal Relations and the nine federally recognized tribes in this state by January first each year.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
